summary: Website to sell the user's sports cards to buyers (sports card marketplace/e-commerce site).

existing_features.title: Build a public storefront UI where buyers can browse, search, and filter sports card listings.
Add a buyer order request flow on the card detail page.
Create an admin/seller dashboard secured by Internet Identity to manage listings and order requests.
Apply a coherent visual theme for a sports collectibles storefront and enforce it consistently across pages.
Add generated static brand imagery and integrate it into the UI.

Extend the buyer purchase request flow on the listing detail page so an authenticated buyer can submit a purchase request that includes (a) an optional offer price and (b) an optional message to the seller, instead of only submitting a listingId.
Update the admin/seller order requests UI to display the buyerâ€™s submitted offer price (if provided) and message (if provided) for each order request.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a website for the user to list and sell sports cards to buyers (basic e-commerce/marketplace).
Create backend data models and APIs to support a sports card catalog with seller-managed listings.
Create backend data models and APIs for buyer order requests (an intent-to-buy) tied to a specific card.
Implement a backward-compatible Motoko state migration for existing order requests to support the new optional offer price and optional message fields.

projectName: Sports Card Selling Website (Listings + Buyer Orders)
